hints.title: Spacetime Node
hints.content:
20: :label: def-node-spacetime
21: 
22: A **node** $n \in \mathcal{N}$ represents a single walker at a single discrete timestep. The node set is:
23: 
24: $$
25: \mathcal{N} := \{n_{i,t} : i \in \{1, \ldots, N\}, \, t \in \{0, 1, \ldots, T\}\},
26: 
27: $$
28: 
29: where:
30: - $N$: Total number of walkers (fixed population size)
31: - $T$: Total number of timesteps
32: - $n_{i,t}$: Node representing walker $i$ at timestep $t$
33: 
34: **Node cardinality:** $|\mathcal{N}| = N \times (T+1)$ (total spacetime points)

hints.label: def-node-attributes
hints.title: Node Scalar Attributes
hints.content:
42: :label: def-node-attributes
43: 
44: Each node $n_{i,t} \in \mathcal{N}$ contains the following **scalar (frame-invariant)** quantities explicitly present in the Adaptive Gas SDE:
45: 
46: **Identity:**
47: - $\text{walker\_id}(n) = i \in \{1, \ldots, N\}$: Walker index
48: - $\text{timestep}(n) = t \in \{0, 1, \ldots, T\}$: Discrete timestep
49: - $\text{node\_id}(n) = i + t \cdot N \in \mathbb{N}$: Global unique identifier
50: 
51: **Temporal Scalar:**
52: - $t(n) := t \cdot \Delta t \in \mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}$: Continuous time coordinate
53: 
54: **Status Scalar:**
55: - $s(n) \in \{0, 1\}$: Survival status (1=alive in $A_k$, 0=dead/out-of-bounds)
56: 
57: **Energy Scalars:**
58: - $E_{\text{kin}}(n) := \frac{1}{2} \|v(n)\|^2 \in \mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}$: Kinetic energy (scalar norm of velocity)
59: - $U(n) := U(x(n)) \in \mathbb{R}$: Confining potential energy
60: 
61: **Fitness Scalar:**
62: - $\Phi(n) := \Phi(x(n)) \in \mathbb{R}$: Fitness value (objective function)
63: 
64: **Virtual Reward Scalar:**
65: - $V_{\text{fit}}(n) := V_{\text{fit}}[f_k, \rho](x(n)) \in \mathbb{R}$: ρ-localized fitness potential
66: 
67: **Localized Statistical Scalars:**
68: - $\mu_\rho(n) := \mu_\rho[f_k, \Phi, x(n)] \in \mathbb{R}$: Localized mean fitness in ρ-neighborhood
69: - $\sigma_\rho(n) := \sigma_\rho[f_k, \Phi, x(n)] \in \mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}$: Localized standard deviation
70: - $\sigma'_\rho(n) := \sigma'_{\text{patch}}(\sigma^2_\rho(n)) \in \mathbb{R}_{> 0}$: Regularized C¹ standard deviation
71: - $Z_\rho(n) := Z_\rho[f_k, \Phi, x(n)] \in \mathbb{R}$: ρ-localized Z-score
72: 
73: **Global Algorithm Parameters (scalars, fixed throughout):**
74: - $\epsilon_F \in \mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}$: Adaptive force strength
75: - $\nu \in \mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}$: Viscosity coefficient
76: - $\gamma \in \mathbb{R}_{> 0}$: Friction coefficient
